entries.description: Fix threading issue preventing SAM Applications from opening in Rider 2023.1
Fix issue reconnecting to CodeWhisperer using an Identity Center directory outside of us-east-1 (#3662)
Fix 'null' is not a connection when authenticating to CodeWhisperer
CodeWhisperer: user is sometimes required to re-login before token expiration
Fix issue where the "Do not ask again" option is not respected when switching connections on CodeWhisperer/CodeCatalyst
An upcoming release will remove support for JetBrains Gateway version 2022.2 and version 2022.3
Remove support for Aurora MySQL v1 (#3356)
